sn35.155:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.155:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hoti”ti?
sn35.155:2.1: “Cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya dhammam deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya.
sn35.155:2.2: Cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti, ‘dhammanudhammappatipanno bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya.
sn35.155:2.3: Cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbida viraga nirodha anupadavimutto hoti, ‘ditthadhammanibbanappatto bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya …pe…
sn35.155:2.4: jivhaya ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya dhammam deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya …pe…
sn35.155:2.5: manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya dhammam deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya.
sn35.155:2.6: Manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti, ‘dhammanudhammappatipanno bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya.
sn35.155:2.7: Manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbida viraga nirodha anupadavimutto hoti, ‘ditthadhammanibbanappatto bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya”ti.
